definition: section/paragraph/funds/CL:筆|笔[bi3],個|个[ge4]/classifier for versions or models (of a product)

sentences.english: I wonder if I can send cables without cash payment.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道是否可以不用现款拍发电报。

sentences.english: Cash on hand tallies with the figure in the accounts.
sentences.chinese: 现款跟账上的数目没有出入。

sentences.english: I have no cash on me. May I pay by check?
sentences.chinese: 我没带现款，我可以用支票付款吗？

sentences.english: Waiter: Would you like to sign the bill or pay cash?
sentences.chinese: 请问您是签房账还是付现款？

sentences.english: In 10 years people will only use cards for money.
sentences.chinese: 10年后，人们仅用信用卡进行现款交易。

sentences.english: I intend to close my deposit account in six days.
sentences.chinese: 我打算在六天内把所有的现款全部提走。

sentences.english: Payment by cash to be made only at the Centre.
sentences.chinese: 如以现款支付，请亲临本中心交与负责人。

sentences.english: The minimum purchase value in Cash & Carry store is $50.
sentences.chinese: 在现款取货商店最低购物额不能少于50美元。

sentences.english: You'd better encash your motorcycle at once.
sentences.chinese: 你最好马上卖掉摩托车换成现款。

sentences.english: Lack of cash foced us to scrap plans for a new house.
sentences.chinese: 我们现款不足，只好打消买房子的念头。

sentences.english: Accounting profits are nice, but cold cash is what pays the bills.
sentences.chinese: 会计利润是好，可手头现款才是能拿来付账单的。

sentences.english: The purchases were paid for with cash.
sentences.chinese: 这些购置是用现款支付的。

sentences.english: According to our regulations, you have to pay cash.
sentences.chinese: 按饭店的规定您得付现款。

sentences.english: According to our regulation, you have to pay cash.
sentences.chinese: 按酒店的规定您得付现款。

sentences.english: Other acts of kindness include cash donations and charity.
sentences.chinese: 其他善举还包括捐助现款及慈善义捐。

sentences.english: Bob paid the bill by cashing in some bonds.
sentences.chinese: 鲍勃将一部分债券兑成了现款付了账。

definition: exterior appearance/to view sth from the outside/exterior condition
Škoda, Czech Republic car manufacturer, a subsidiary of Volkswagen Group
